Package org.ncg.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    This is the root of the abilities of an Application.
    Location
    This class represents a location in the adventure game.
    Map
    This class represents the map of locations in the game.
    Player
    This class represents a player of the adventure game.
    TextView
    This view is a simple console view, displaying text directly.
    View  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ApplicationAlreadyExistsException
    This exception is thrown if the user attempts to create a second instance of the Application.
    InvalidLocationIdException
    This exception is thrown if an invalid location id is used.
    MapConnectionAlreadyExists
    This exception is used when attempting to add a second connection in the map for a given Location in a particular direction.
    NoLocationInDirectionException
    This exception is thrown if there is no location in the specified direction from the specified location.
